item.title: Exploring Emotional Features in GPT2-Small
item.description: 🎶Code in this post can be found at the jupyter notebook in my “saeExploration” repo. Find features that reflect positive emotions To find the features related to a specific emotion and reduce data deviation, I write five sentences containing the key words for each emotion. For example, for happy emotions I have: 1 2 3 4 5 prompt_happy = ["I'll be on a vacation tomorrow and I'm so happy.", "My mombrings home a new puppy and I'm so happy.
